p: Lastly, there should be more discussion about the risk of microcephaly. The comparisons to French Polynesia and Yap are great but there is a lot of other work that has been done, especially clinical studies: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/26943629 and https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/27960197. It is especially important to understand why the estimates in this manuscript may be on the very low end of what is being reported elsewhere in studies specifically aimed at measuring that risk.
